Load Snowflake configuration from all available sources

Source: R/config.R
load_config.Rd

Loads and consolidates Snowflake configuration from multiple sources with proper precedence handling. Configuration sources include:

Usage

load_config(name = NULL, config_dir = default_config_dir())

Arguments

name

A named connection to use. If NULL, the default connection will be used

config_dir

The directory containing Snowflake configuration files. Defaults to the result of default_config_dir().

Value

A list with the following components:

connections

List of available connection configurations

connection_name

The resolved connection name to use

connection_file

Path to the configuration file that was loaded

Details

  1. connections.toml and config.toml files

  2. Environment variables (both generic and connection-specific)

  3. User-provided parameters

The function follows Snowflake's client behavior for resolving connection names and handling conflicts between configuration sources.
